A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Let me start by saying I LOVED "The Force Awakens"!
That movie set up the new trilogy so well. Emotional\, exciting\, true to the originals\, great new characters\, lots of questions teased.
It had so much potential!

I was really excited for Episode VIII but "Last Jedi" completely WASTED that potential!
This was a steaming pile of s***! It not only didn't answer the questions from Force Awakens but ruined the new and classic characters.
It also introduced completely superfluous (an annoying!) characters.

So damn disappointing!
